word:
Christ's Sinlessness Disturbed Satan 


     Christ, the Redeemer of the world, was not situated where the influences surrounding Him were the best calculated to preserve a life of purity and untainted 
                                                                           134
morals, yet He was not contaminated. He was not free from temptation. Satan was earnest and persevering in His efforts to deceive and overcome the Son of God by his devices.
